mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComDmstcDlvCstPlc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-29 */ DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , DLV_PLC_NM , COM_ID , BASE_DLV_CST_PLC_YN , RTRVL_DRCT_PSB_YN , OVSEA_DLV_DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_YN , USE_YN , DLV_MN_CD , DLV_COM_CD , DLV_PSB_DAY , DLVSP_POST_NO , DLVSP_BASE_ADDR , DLVSP_DETAIL_ADDR , DMSTC_DLV_BOX_PSB_VOL , DMSTC_DLV_BOX_PSB_WT , DLV_CST_LEVY_SECT_CD , DMSTC_DLV_CST_EXM_STDR_AMT , DMSTC_DLV_CST , QDLV_CST_LEVY_SECT_CD , QDLV_CST_EXM_STDR_AMT , QDLV_CST , REPAIR_DLV_CST_LEVY_SECT_CD , REPAIR_DLV_CST , RETRN_MN_CD , RETRN_COM_CD , RETRN_POST_NO , RETRN_BASE_ADDR , RETRN_DETAIL_ADDR , SLR_IMPT_RTGOD_DLV_CST , SLR_IMPT_EXCHG_DLV_CST , RTGOD_DLIVY_DLV_CST_INCLS_YN , BUYER_IMPT_RTGOD_DLV_CST , BUYER_IMPT_EXCHG_DLV_CST , DLV_MTHD_DSCR , MOBILE_DLV_MTHD_DSCR , GFCT_DSCR , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC WHERE 1 = 1 AND DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{dmstcDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteComDmstcDlvCstPlc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-29 */ FROM COM_DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC WHERE 1 = 1 AND DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{dmstcDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
